definition.name: Synapse workspace deployment
definition.description: Use this GitHub action to deploy synapse workspace.
definition.author: azure

inputs.name: TargetWorkspaceName
inputs.description: Provide the Synapse workspace name where you want to deploy the artifacts.

inputs.name: TemplateFile
inputs.description: Specify the path to the workspace artifacts template.

inputs.name: ParametersFile
inputs.description: Specify the path to the template parameter file.

inputs.name: Environment
inputs.description: Provide the type of cloud environment. Valid values are: Azure Public, Azure China, Azure US Government, Azure Germany

inputs.name: resourceGroup
inputs.description: Provide the resource group of the target Synapse workspace.

inputs.name: clientId
inputs.description: Provide client id of service principal.

inputs.name: clientSecret
inputs.description: Provide client secret of the service principal.

inputs.name: DeleteArtifactsNotInTemplate
inputs.description: Delete the artifacts which are in the workspace but not in the template.

inputs.name: managedIdentity
inputs.description: Use managed identity to generate the bearer token?

inputs.name: deployManagedPrivateEndpoint
inputs.description: Deploy managed private endpoints in the template.

inputs.name: FailOnMissingOverrides
inputs.description: Mark the pipeline as failed if ARM overrides are missing.

inputs.name: ArtifactsFolder
inputs.description: Provide path to the root folder.

inputs.name: npmpackage
inputs.description: Source for the npm package. Only for dev testing.
